nodes.name: PausableI

nodes.documentation: @dev Modifier to make a function callable only when the contract is not paused
nodes.name: whenNotPaused

nodes.documentation: @dev Modifier to make a function callable only when the contract is paused
nodes.name: whenPaused

nodes.documentation: @dev called by a MANAGEMENT_KEY or the identity itself to pause, triggers stopped state
nodes.name: pause

nodes.documentation: @dev called by a MANAGEMENT_KEY or the identity itself to unpause, returns to normal state
nodes.name: unpause

addrToKey(address).details: Convert an Ethereum address (20 bytes) to an ERC725 key (32 bytes)

numKeys().details: Number of keys managed by the contract

pause().details: called by a MANAGEMENT_KEY or the identity itself to pause, triggers stopped state

unpause().details: called by a MANAGEMENT_KEY or the identity itself to unpause, returns to normal state

userdoc.notice: Base contract which allows children to implement an emergency stop mechanism
